00013     eGreedyPolicy::eGreedyPolicy(double e) {
00014         assert((e >= 0.0) && (e <= 1.0));
00015         this->e = e;
00016         epsilonFunc = NULL;
00017     }

00025     eGreedyPolicy::~eGreedyPolicy() {

00031     void eGreedyPolicy::getAction(Vector dist, Vector& action, Observation& obs) {
00032         if (epsilonFunc != NULL)
00033             e = epsilonFunc->getValue(obs.getSteps());
00034         
00035         if (random()/(double)RAND_MAX >= e) {
00036             // Performs greedly
00037             double maxValue = dist[0];
00038             action[0] = 0;
00039             for (Vector::iterator i = dist.begin(); i != dist.end(); i++)
00040                 if (*i > maxValue) {
00041                     maxValue = *i;
00042                     action[0] = i.index();
00043                 }
00044         }
00045         else
00046             // Performs randomly
00047             action[0] = floor((random()/(double)RAND_MAX) * dist.size());
00048 
00049         assert(action[0] < (int)dist.size());
00050     }
00051 }
